title: The Zero Units Fought for the C.I.A. in Afghanistan. In the U.S., They’re Living in Fear.
summary_full: A shooting in Washington, D.C., threw their immigration status into jeopardy — and brought attention to a long-hidden dimension of America’s war.
summary_public: A shooting in Washington, D.C., threw their immigration status into jeopardy — and brought attention to a long-hidden dimension of America’s war.
